# thunder_visibility_zbar (Resource)

`thunder_visibility_zbar`: Configure zbar

__PLACEHOLDER__

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "thunder" {
  address  = var.dut9049
  username = var.username
  password = var.password
}
resource "thunder_visibility_zbar" "thunder_visibility_zbar" {
  action = "enable"
}
```
